duties_responsibilities.duty: Transport FG/materials to and from the plant, following all Safety and DOT procedures.
Occasionally deliver loads to customers and assist in loading/unloading FG’s truck both external and internal with accurate shipments.
Verify that all FG’s shipped match case and barcode labels to avoid mixes to customers.
Maintain housekeeping and 5S to standards set by management.
Accurately loading/unloading of trucks, shipping/receiving of materials.
